title: Vicious Mockery
content:
Vicious Mockery Enchantment Cantrip 1~4 Damage 1d4 Psychic Insult a creature: it has Disadvantage on its next Attack Roll. 1 turn 18m WIS Save Action

Enchantment Cantrip

Insult a creature: it has Disadvantage on its next Attack Roll.

Vicious Mockery is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Vicious Mockery is a Cantrip from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Vicious Mockery Information

Description: Insult a creature: it has Disadvantage on its next Attack Roll. Level: Cantrip School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Duration: 1 Turn Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Wisdom

How to Acquire Vicious Mockery

Vicious Mockery can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Warlock (Pact of the Tome)

Bard, Warlock (Pact of the Tome)

Vicious Mockery Tips & Notes

This spell's damage increases by 1d4 when you reach 5th level (2d4) and 10th level (3d4).
